display_long_description:
The **free-to-download version of Tennis Esports** offers everything you need to connect, play, and enjoy tennis in a vibrant virtual world. Play endless matches, customize your avatar, and socialize with players from around the globe!

Meet up with up to 10 friends in our **social clubs**, explore our **cooperative minigame area**, and enjoy **casual doubles**. You might even go head-to-head with a pro!

Want to stand out on the court? Visit the in-game shop for exclusive outfits and gear to enhance your style.

Explore and get a taste of the *Tennis Esports* universe with a selection of **AI matches, Courses, Arcade**, and the **TechZone** for **Forehand** and **Backhand** training. Take on limited multiplayer challenges.

#### **Social Club**  
- Casual courts for up to 4 players  
- Cooperative minigame area
- Limited match challenge invites 
- Accept unlimited match challenges from *Tennis Esports Premium* members  

#### **Tennis Esports**  
- Full avatar customization  
- Limited courses
- Limited AI challenges
- MirrorPlay Classic – play against yourself  
- HitEmAll Easy  
- Forehand 101 Basics and Backhand 101 Basics  

Unlock unlimited live matches, 10 AI opponents, 25+ training exercises, 6 arcade games, and more with **Tennis Esports Premium**!

Enhance your skills with real tennis techniques—explore our **TechZone Add-Ons** for advanced training, based on scientific research.

Download the app and join Discord 

https://discord.gg/8rcSArKJD4
